H0.text: What colour is the wax covering Gouda cheese. Red

H1.text: What colour is the wax covering Gouda cheese. Brown

H2.text: What colour is the wax covering Gouda cheese. Green

H3.text: What colour is the wax covering Gouda cheese. Yelow

A4.text: The cheese is dried for a few days before being coated with a yellow wax or plastic-like coating to prevent it from drying out.
